title: Is it season 5 yet? Or what
body:
Just asking 2 questions. 
1. Is it season 5 yet?
2. I heard urf was being recreated/changed and is going to come back in season 5. Is urf actually coming back?

replies.body:
No, season 5 hasn't started yet. It's still preseason.
Yes, URF is being revived with some changes.
Yeah that would be sooooo fun. But imagine 10 teemo's or something, urf and one for all would be way too screwed up.

URF + Hexakill + One For All + Doombots 

I can just imagine all the Bush-rens running out of the bush every second.

I never played the original URF, so I am a bit excited about this. I'd love to see all-for-one come back though.
I imagine it could get crazy putting gamemodes together. All-for-one URF mode anyone? :P 10 Sorakas.
Alright thanks :) and thank god urf is coming back.
